name: Alke
movement: walking speed of 50 feet and climbing speed of 30 feet
description: The Alke is a large and imposing monstrosity, notable for its sharp back spikes and strong limbs. With robust physical features, it navigates various terrains with agility.
memorable: Possesses lethal back spikes and can knock opponents prone with a powerful pounce while launching itself at foes.
goals: Primarily seeks to engage in combat, taking down threats or securing its territory.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other monstrous creatures in wild areas.
environment: Typically found in forests or mountainous regions where it can utilize its climbing ability.
strengths: Exceptional Strength and Constitution scores, making it a formidable opponent in battle.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence limits tactical capabilities and strategic interactions.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack that consists of a beak attack and two claws attacks, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Piercing Roll allows it to propel itself at foes with spikes, dealing substantial damage and potentially knocking them prone.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 60 feet and has a passive perception score of 16, indicating good vigilance.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, which enhances its ability to detect threats.
additional_information: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
Can improve its AC in response to attacks with Repelling Spikes.
